summary: Ferrari is an Italian company known for making luxurious and fast sports cars. It was started in 1939 by Enzo Ferrari and became famous for its racing team, Scuderia Ferrari, which has won many Formula One championships. The company's cars are expensive and desired by many. Ferrari also has a strong brand image and is considered one of the world's most valuable car companies. It offers various models, from supercars to SUVs, and its racing heritage makes it a popular and iconic brand.
title: Ferrari
